summary: My first mod! Go easy on me! LOL!
descriptionHtml:
Von Helton\'s Whiterun Estates was created to fill a void......Lack of bedding for all my 15 followers. It may or may not be true, but my followers seem to fight better after a good rest. I will improve on this one, and make more as time permits. I will also be doing NPC\'s & Followers as well.

NOTE: It appears a mod called \"Adult Prostitution\" that I looked at got somehow attached, but without any adult content. I\'ll be fixing this. This one is supposed to be the \"clean\" version.

IF you have AP, you should be ok, if you don\'t, plz wait until I re-up. Thnx.

:/

Version 1.1:

Fixed the Master links (no AP refs)
Temporarily disabled the bookshelves
Turned chests around to open towards the player.

:)

Version 1.2:

Fixed lighting back to default
Fixed beds back to default
Added more chests (Be sure to remove your items before installing!)

NOTE: I\'ve found, to my horror, that chests will \"break\" if overfilled. If they do, you lose EVERYTHING, so *ALWAYS* save before placing items in a chest!

*******

Version 1.3:

Followers & NPC\'s no longer try to walk into the firepit. Abiant color changed from turquoise (why??) to a more real orange.

*********

.
author: VonHelton
